story_title: Where Did the Roanoke Colony Disappear To?
original_story: [mysterious] Get this—over 400 years ago, an entire colony vanished! In 1587, 117 English settlers on Roanoke Island left behind one cryptic clue: 'CROATOAN' carved into a tree. No bodies, no signs of struggle—just silence. This baffling disappearance sparked wild theories, from integration with local tribes to alien abduction! Could they have sought refuge on Croatoan Island, or did nature claim them? To this day, the fate of Roanoke remains one of America's greatest mysteries, leaving historians scratching their heads.
